author: Associated Press
title: Spain closes airports on Canary Islands due to sand storm
description: Spanish authorities say they have closed airports on the Canary Islands because of a wind storm that is blinding the archipelago with sand and dust
content:
The regional government for the Canary Islands says that wind gusts could reach 120 kph (around 75 mph). Authorities have closed schools for Monday.
Television images show palm trees whipping in the wind amid a thick yellow haze enveloping the islands.

title: Trump express optimism for US peace deal with Taliban
description: President Donald Trump says he's ready to sign a peace deal with the Taliban in Afghanistan if a temporary truce holds in America's longest war
content:
The two sides earlier this month announced the truce, which took effect last Friday and set the stage for a broader deal aimed at ending 18 years of war in Afghanistan and bringing U.S. troops home.
